messages.message: Hi Anil, I merged this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/64237) for upgrade to 0.77  few weeks ago and marked this vulnerability (https://instabase.atlassian.net/issues/VTEST-25797) as done. However this was again moved to todo. Are there more steps after merging like certifying or something that Iâ€™m missing?
I think you need to update in other repos that job-service uses too
We use quite a few shared utils, maybe one of those is still on the old version

```#!/bin/bash

# Get the list of modified go.mod files from git diff
modified_files=$(git diff --name-only --diff-filter=M | grep 'go.mod')

# Iterate over each modified go.mod file
for file in $modified_files; do
    # Extract the directory path of the go.mod file
    dir=$(dirname "$file")
    
    echo "Running 'go mod tidy' in $dir"

    # Change to the directory containing the go.mod file
    cd "$dir" || exit 1

    # Run go mod tidy to update go.sum and dependencies
    make build
    go mod tidy

    # Return to the original directory
    cd - > /dev/null || exit 1
done

echo "Completed 'go mod tidy' in all modified directories."```
update everywhere then run above to update go mod in all changed files
hope you had a safe flight
let me know if you are free for a quick sync

create a ticket for adding system test to SDK
create a ticket for adding system test to API
verify if anything else is missing system test
